title: Dockerfile build Issue: git submodule update --recursive
body_html:
Hi, When I build dockerfile, I see error message about git submodule.

Step 10/14 : RUN git submodule update --init
 ---> Running in 0633cd9d62c6
fatal: Not a git repository (or any of the parent directories): .git
The command '/bin/sh -c git submodule update --init' returned a non-zero code: 128

Ubuntu16.04 and git version 2.16.1.
body_text:
Hi, When I build dockerfile, I see error message about git submodule.
Step 10/14 : RUN git submodule update --init
 ---> Running in 0633cd9d62c6
fatal: Not a git repository (or any of the parent directories): .git
The command '/bin/sh -c git submodule update --init' returned a non-zero code: 128

Ubuntu16.04 and git version 2.16.1.
body:
Hi, When I build dockerfile, I see error message about git submodule.

```
Step 10/14 : RUN git submodule update --init
 ---> Running in 0633cd9d62c6
fatal: Not a git repository (or any of the parent directories): .git
The command '/bin/sh -c git submodule update --init' returned a non-zero code: 128
```


Ubuntu16.04 and git version 2.16.1.
